insert.foreach: insert hm_crm_source_staff(RELATYPE, STAFFID, SOURCEID, COMPANYID) (select '${relaType}' as RELATYPE,'${item}' AS STAFFID,ID,'${companyId}' AS COMPANYID FROM hm_crm_source where CHANNELID = #{channelId} and COMPANYID = #{companyId});

mapper.delete: delete from hm_crm_source_staff where id in (select SOURCEID from hm_crm_source source where source.CHANNELID = #{channelId} and source.COMPANYID = #{companyId}) and COMPANYID = #{companyId}
